channel.title: manga on iPardalis - Ambilobe Panther Chameleons for sale. Panther chameleons for sale near me.
channel.description: Recent content in manga on iPardalis - Ambilobe Panther Chameleons for sale. Panther chameleons for sale near me.

item.title: Jimanga
item.description: Jimanga is one of our 5th gen Ambilobe breeders. He comes from our Manga x Imelda pairing, a great collab with Ramblin’ Exotics. I can trace his personality all the way back to Kako. They teach you that chameleons are a look-but-don’t-touch pet, the hard way haha… but what comes with that is an absolutely amazing defense display. Definitely something I really enjoy about these guys! Jimanga Jimanga1 Jimanga2

item.title: Manga x Imelda
item.description: This pairing was between our fourth generation hold back, Manga, and our female from Ramblin’ Exotics, Imelda. Imelda is a great mix of WC Gambit lines and Kammerflage Kreations yellow-bodied blue bar Ambilobe while Manga is the male with the most striking yellows from our Bleu x Patch clutch. We kept Jimanga from this group and he has his father’s wonderful profile! Just a gorgeous group of Ambilobe. Manga x Imelda Hatch dates 12/03/2021 - 2/19/2022 Hatch rate 15/19 M1

item.title: Manga
item.description: Manga had some of the nicest yellows from all of Bleu and Patch’s sons. He has a striking facial pattern and is a classic Ambilobe panther chameleon. We’re very lucky to have him in our 4th generation breeding program. Manga Manga1 Manga2 Manga3 Manga4 Manga5 Manga6 Manga7 Manga8 Filial F4-CG4 Sire Bleu Dam Patch 5 Generation Tree Ancestral Report for Manga Generation 1 1. Manga. Manga was born on 2020-10-28 at iPardalis.
